archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0406
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a BSS Solution, I must be able to apply customer discounts with security controls in place, so that customers can be given discounts, have discounts removed, or have discounts changed, so that these present on the customer bill

properties.value: OOTB. Presentation on the invoice to be discussed (one line, two separate lines?)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
